data.text: @maggie_xer @imgrund @Sflecce Fair pt. 2 of our 3 have autoimmune diseases that require us to make decisions to protect them. I can't make society bend to our needs, it just isn't practical and I wouldn't want that if situations were flipped.

@maggie_xer @imgrund @Sflecce Maybe all the parents should stop projecting (irrational) fear onto their kids.
